Entries.default:
"You're here to take the Book of Storms from me, I know it!"

The woman's hair is a mess, her clothes ragged. Her face is haggard with exhaustion.
"I won't let you steal it from me! It's mine! I found it!"
"I don't even know what the Book of Storms is."
"I won't be fooled by your lies!"
"Back away, oaf. You might damage the book with your caustic breath."
"Arkemyr didn't believe it was real either - he told me I was mad. But I have proof! I'll show him!"
"Book of Storms is a myth. Only a fool would seek it out."
She turns to her minions and gestures wildly at you.
"You can't have it! It's mine. Mine!" She glares at you with narrowed, untrusting eyes and gritted teeth.
"IMP WANT GO HOME. HOW LONG LEOFWYN KEEP IMP HERE?"
"Position. Locked. For. Seventy. Eight. Point. Three. Three. Three. Hours."
The void skull screeches with the piercing wail of a woman falling from a tall building.
"LEOFWYN LET IMP HELP? CLEAN BOOK WITH TONGUE."
